whyWorks.title: Why Reviewsvisor works?
whyWorks.lightningAnalysisDesc: Reviewsvisor transforms your reviews into insights in seconds, allowing you to make quick and reliable decisions. Thanks to a clear and visual synthesis, you identify key trends and action priorities that matter for your establishment. The analysis also highlights your strengths to consolidate what works.
whyWorks.immediatelyActionableDesc: Reviewsvisor doesn't just identify problems‚Ä¶ it proposes concrete and prioritized solutions. Each recommendation is measurable, linked to customer satisfaction, to help you act effectively and track your progress over time.
whyWorks.ultraPreciseAnalysisDesc: AI detects emotions, recurring problems and improvement opportunities with exceptional accuracy. It measures the tone of reviews and highlights weak signals to reveal the real customer loyalty levers.
whyWorks.measurableGrowthDesc: Reviewsvisor helps you increase your online rating, attract more customers and improve your revenue.
whyWorks.growthStat3: gain +0.5 to +1 point rating in a few weeks.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.barRepresentsProblems: Bars represent recurring problems, line shows cumulative percentage of criticisms
dashboard.barRepresentsStrengths: Bars represent positive mentions, line shows cumulative percentage of strengths
dashboard.basedOnRating: Based on average rating, proportion of positive reviews and recent evolution.
dashboard.identifyProblems: Identification of the 3 most critical problems to solve as a priority.
dashboard.calculateScore: Automatic calculation of your average score based on sentiment analysis.
dashboard.summaryRecommendations: Quick summary and personalized recommendations in a few clicks.
dashboard.canModifyBeforeValidate: You can modify it before validating
dashboard.defaultPositiveResponse: Thank you {{name}} for your positive feedback! We're delighted that you enjoyed your experience with us. Looking forward to seeing you again soon!
dashboard.defaultNegativeResponse: Hello {{name}}, we apologize for this disappointing experience. Your feedback is valuable and we will improve our services. Feel free to contact us directly.
dashboard.ratingProgressionSinceRegistration: Your rating progression since establishment registration
dashboard.analyzeEstablishmentToSeePlatforms: Analyze your establishment to see platforms
dashboard.analyzeEstablishmentToSeeProblems: Analyze your establishment to see problems
dashboard.analyzeEstablishmentToSeeStrengths: Analyze your establishment to see strengths
dashboard.analyzeEstablishmentToGetRecommendations: Analyze your establishment to get recommendations
dashboard.analyzeEstablishmentToSeeThemes: Analyze your establishment to see themes
dashboard.concreteActions: Concrete and prioritized actions to implement
dashboard.respondSystematically: Respond systematically to customer reviews (positive and negative)
dashboard.setUpRegularTracking: Set up regular customer satisfaction tracking

import.autoImportForEstablishment: Automatic import of Google reviews for "{{name}}"
import.selectEstablishmentToImport: Select an establishment to import Google reviews
import.analyzeReviewsDesc: Import your reviews manually or via a CSV file to get a detailed analysis.
import.selectCsvOrJson: Please select a CSV or JSON file.
import.instruction1: Go to Google Takeout via the official link
import.instruction3: Scroll down and enable "Google Business Profile".
import.instruction4: Click on "Next step" and follow the instructions to export your data.
import.instruction5: Once the export is complete and the download is done, extract the file.
import.instruction7: Copy the content and paste it here.
import.pastePlaceholder: Paste reviews copied from Google Maps or Tripadvisor here...
import.pasteHelp: Paste multiple reviews at once. The system will automatically detect ratings, authors and comments.
import.previewDetected: Preview of detected reviews ({{total}} total, {{valid}} valid)
import.incompleteRowsWarning: Rows in red are incomplete and will not be imported.
import.noReviewsInPastedText: No reviews detected in the pasted text. Check the format or try pasting other content.
import.enterReviewsOnePerLine: Enter your customer reviews (one per line)
import.enterReviewsPlaceholder:
Enter your reviews here, one review per line...

Example:
Excellent restaurant, impeccable service!
Very good welcome, delicious dishes.
Pleasant setting but service a bit slow.
import.dragAndDropFile: Drag and drop your file here
import.orClickToSelectFile: or click to select a CSV or JSON file
import.noEstablishmentSelected: No establishment selected. Add or save an establishment before importing reviews.
import.exampleReview: Example: "Excellent restaurant, impeccable service and delicious dishes! A bit tired tart but the quality was there. Very very nice!"
